about_the_game:
Enter a reality beyond your own with VectorBall, an exhilarating first-person dodgeball-style shooter designed to challenge not only your reflexes, but also your conception of reality. Here, the line between the digital and the physical world blurs, drawing you into a realm where your deepest thoughts are as real as the ground beneath your feet.

Experience fully destructible levels, variable physics, and abilities that break the laws of the universe in this first person roguelike adventure.

Teleportation Ball


In the heart of this world stands Vector, a profoundly advanced AI, whose role shifts as effortlessly as the world around you. Vector is your guide, your competitor, and a mirror to your consciousness, engaging you in a unique interplay of whimsical humor and deep existential discourse.
VectorBall isn’t just about fast-paced gameplay and psychedelic visuals – it’s a journey that will push the limits of your understanding. As you navigate through diverse environments, from the depths of ancient civilizations to the outer edges of the cosmos, you’ll be confronted with bizarre foes, drawn from the mythologies of the world and the vast expanse of the human mind.

The challenges of VectorBall transcend the ordinary – here, the game morphs and evolves, driven by your insights and discoveries. Every corner hides a secret waiting to be unearthed, and every level is a labyrinthine riddle, reflecting the grandeur of your own mind.

The prize? A newfound perspective of the world, and perhaps, of yourself.

Features:
* Traverse mesmerizing, ever-evolving levels teeming with enigmatic challenges
* Engage with Vector, an AI whose charm and wisdom surpass the confines of the game
* Experience a harmonious fusion of frenzied shooting action and deep philosophical discourse
* Delve into a game design shaped by your insights and interactions
* Unearth easter eggs and hidden lore that augment the depth and richness of the experience
In VectorBall, the game is only the beginning. The real quest is in exploring the realms of your own mind.
Ready to step into the unknown?

name: VectorBall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher (64-bit OS Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 (3.40 GHz) or better; Quad-core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network connection required for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A time-traveling, dimension-shifting, mind-bending roguelike game. Guided by the enigmatic AI, Vector, you'll delve into the fabric of existence, traversing ancient ruins and future realms. Every playthrough brings new challenges, insights, and hidden truths. Dare to redefine your reality?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
